thread.section_title: Displayit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Displayit | displayit.com
thread.title: Chad

author: Chad
title: Chad
text:
Cindy did a great job of helping me determine exactly what I need and how to get it. She was professional, personable, and prompt each time she was needed. She also helped when I need a reminder to get my order in to be sure it was printed and shipped prior to my trade show event.
The product came as expected and the print quality was as good as I hoped it would be.
I will use you again!
Thank you.
